name: FOX TALE
description:
I created my very own platformer game using Unity. This game has been designed to be easily understandable to everyone in the gaming industry, so whether you’re a complete beginner, or advanced I am looking to expand my game development range and this game enabled me to gain a greater understanding of game development. At the end of this game, you will see me developing the ability to create game elements as: A character with full movement, jumping & double-jumping capabilities; Collectibles such as gems & extra health; Parallaxing background effects; Different types of enemies to combat; moving & flying enemies; Level Mechanics like Spikes, moving platforms, crushing blocks & more; Full user Interface with interactive menus; Creating levels with tilemaps; Multiple levels and a level select screen and a unique and challenging boss battle.

Controls: Right Arrow (to move right), Left Arrow (to move left), Space (to jump), Double Space (to double jump)
